title: The Dangerous Myth of Managing Earth’s Climate
summary: A recent piece in New Scientist has reminded me that it is a myth that humans, if they are wise and clever enough, can learn to "manage" the biosphere. The piece is about the unfortunate trade-off between pollution reduction and global warming. It has been known for some time that successful effort…

title: Musk Buys $1 Billion Tesla Shares After Huge Payout Proposal
summary: Elon Musk bought on Friday shares in Tesla worth about $1 billion, a regulatory filing showed on Monday, just over a week after Tesla’s board proposed an unheard of $1-trillion pay package for the Tesla CEO if the EV maker reaches major production, innovation, and market capitalization goals. Musk …
